backup_add_provider_info: An invite will be sent to this device. They must accept before backups can begin.
backup_auto_accept_desc: Automatically accept backup requests from known contacts
backup_client_info: Your data is encrypted before being sent to backup providers. Only you can decrypt it.
backup_history_hint: Review previous snapshots, add notes, or restore.
backup_no_clients_desc: When other devices send you backup requests, they will appear here
backup_no_clients_hint: When other devices send you backup requests, they will appear here
backup_no_contacts_hint: You need contacts with an NPUB to use as backup providers
backup_no_providers_desc: Add a backup provider to securely store your data on another device
backup_no_providers_hint: Add a backup provider to store your encrypted data
backup_note_placeholder: Add a short note to remember why this snapshot matters
backup_pinned: Backup pinned - will not be auto-deleted
backup_provider_accepting: Accepting backup requests from other devices
backup_provider_disabled_desc: Enable to store encrypted backups for other devices
backup_provider_enabled_desc: You are accepting backup requests from other devices
backup_remove_client_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove {0}? Their backup data will be deleted.
backup_remove_client_message: Are you sure you want to remove this client? Their backup data will be deleted.
backup_remove_provider_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove {0} as a backup provider? Your backup data on their device will be deleted.
backup_remove_provider_message: Are you sure you want to remove this backup provider? Your backup data on their device will be deleted.
backup_restore_overwrites: Warning: This will overwrite your current data!
backup_restore_warning: This will restore your data from the selected snapshot.
backup_role_provider_description: Store encrypted backups for other devices. Help your contacts keep their data safe.
backup_role_user_description: Back up your data to trusted contacts. Your working folder will be encrypted and stored on their devices.
backup_select_provider_hint: Choose a contact to store your encrypted backups
backup_setup_description: Choose how you want to use the Backup feature. You can back up your data to trusted contacts, or help others by storing their encrypted backups.
